title: Step 1
desc: The first step is pretty easy. Just fill out the application form given above and let us know you are interested in joining the Hack Club NUV Team!

title: Step 2
desc: Now that you have applied, just sit tight while we review your applications. We'll get back to you soon via email, and let you know our decision regardless of the verdict.

title: Step 3
desc: Once you are accepted, you can now have a trial run for your selected posting. We expect you to take initiative and help out with the community. This will allow you to get to know the team as well as the workflow. Don't worry, we'll help you along with everything

title: Step 4
desc: If you had fun in the trial run and want to become a part of the team, we can have an informal discussion to start your onboarding process!!
